TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɔː l z t eɪ l ɚ æ z h æ d t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð ɪ z t ɪ ŋ z w iː t h æ v f ɹ ʌ m ð ɪ s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ eɪ k s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v θ eɪ k s l æ p s ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b i s n æ p f ɔːɹ h ɜː b ɹ ʌ d ɚ b ɔː w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n ɛ ɡ æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t f ɹ ʌ v f ɜː d ɪ k z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð ɪ z t ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n w iː w əl ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɜː w ɛ n ə z æ d ɪ t ɹ æ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
